unable to/without end

lit. if you can't eat it all, you'll have to take it home (idiom)/fig. you'll have to take the consequences
pinyin: chi1 bu5 liao3 dou1 zhe5 zou3

definition: won't get far/unlikely to be successful
does not count for anything/of no account
water in a distant place is of little use in putting out a fire right here/(fig.) a slow remedy does not address the current emergency

definition: lit. a dog can't stop himself from eating shit (idiom)/fig. bad habits are hard to change

definition: rabbits don't have long tails (idiom)/its days are numbered/won't last long

definition: better kept under the table (idiom)/not to be disclosed/too inferior to show in public

sentences.english: Man is the only creature that consumes without producing.
sentences.chinese: 人是一種最可憐的傢伙，什麼都產不了，只會揮霍。

sentences.english: The number of books, and the rate of reading them, matters not a whit. It’s not a competition.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀的數量，以及速率說明不了什麼。

sentences.english: Also the Kui gets thus, otherwise, really fear that that horse will accept to can not stand them.
sentences.chinese: 也虧得如此，不然，真怕那匹馬會承受不了他們。

sentences.english: Forget pain, very not a scar.
I find salesmanship beyond my reach.
sentences.chinese: 我發現我我搞不了推銷。

sentences.english: He like dogs, but I can never stand the yelping.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡狗，但我實在受不了那汪汪的叫聲。

sentences.english: Nothing can beguile the old man.
sentences.chinese: 什麼也欺騙不了這位老人。

sentences.english: He is a greto football player, from all accounts.
sentences.chinese: 外傳他是個很不了起的足球運帶動。

sentences.english: Althogh I tried to pursuade him to stop smoking, he still could not make his mind.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我盡力勸他別抽菸了，他還是下不了決心。

sentences.english: That doesn't mean these materials won't play a significant role, Wadia says.
sentences.chinese: 瓦迪亞說，這並不意味着這些材料起不了多大作用。

sentences.english: He took the spring out of the clock but now he can't get it back.
sentences.chinese: 他將鐘錶裏的發條取了出來，可現在裝上不了。

sentences.english: It’s no big deal. I don’t mind helping you out.
sentences.chinese: 這沒什麼大不了的，我不介意幫助你擺脫困境。

sentences.english: My parents can not help me either.
My friend said she never forget the delicious of the soup.
sentences.chinese: 朋友說，她這輩子也忘不了那鍋魚湯的鮮美。

sentences.english: I could never be a mountaineer; I have no head for heights .
sentences.chinese: 我永遠也當不了登山運動員，因爲我不能登高。

sentences.english: If you cannot win, make the one ahead of you break the record. ----- Jan McKeithen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你贏不了，就幫你前面那個破記錄吧。
